# Invaritech AI - LLM Context

> Invaritech is a boutique development studio specializing in backend automation, 
> custom integrations, and workflow optimization for small businesses and agencies.

## About

Invaritech operates as a "studio model" - a small team of architects who design 
and build custom solutions, supported by a trusted network of specialists for 
specific needs. We focus on solving the single biggest bottleneck costing our 
clients 100+ hours per month.

## Core Services

- **Backend Development & Automation**: Custom APIs, integrations, and workflow automation
- **System Integration**: Connecting existing tools into reliable, automated workflows
- **Compliance Solutions**: Building bridges and automation for regulatory requirements
- **Product Development**: Creating focused tools for specific business needs

## Key Pages

- Home: https://invaritech.ai/
- Work & Case Studies: https://invaritech.ai/work
- About the Team: https://invaritech.ai/about
- WeekendSuite Product: https://invaritech.ai/weekend-suite
- Careers: https://invaritech.ai/careers
- Contact: https://invaritech.ai/contact

## Featured Projects

### EUDR Compliance Bridge
Built a Python FastAPI bridge and database around a SOAP-based EU backend, 
enabling a small French operator to submit thousands of Due Diligence Statements 
through a simple REST API and dashboard.

**Tech Stack**: Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, SOAP
**Link**: https://invaritech.ai/work/eudr-compliance-bridge

### China Coast Community Website Redesign
Redesigned a Hong Kong charity's website and donation flow to simplify the donor 
experience and streamline content management for staff.

**Tech Stack**: Next.js, Stripe, CMS Integration
**Status**: Ongoing

### WeekendSuite (In Development)
An in-house product: a weekend-sized admin suite for freelancers and tiny agencies. 
Handles the messy middle from lead → proposal → contract → onboarding → invoice.

**Link**: https://invaritech.ai/weekend-suite

## Team

- **Avishek Rakshit**: Full-stack architect with expertise in backend systems and automation
- **Aditi Srinivas**: Product designer and frontend specialist

## Technology Focus

- **Backend**: Python (FastAPI), Node.js, PostgreSQL, REST/SOAP APIs
- **Frontend**: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Modern CSS
- **Integration**: Stripe, CRM systems, custom API bridges
- **Infrastructure**: Cloud deployment, monitoring, retry queues

## Business Model

We deliver custom automation solutions within 6 weeks, focusing on:
1. Identifying the biggest time-consuming bottleneck
2. Designing an elegant, maintainable solution
3. Building and deploying the automation
4. Giving clients their time back

## Contact

- Website: https://invaritech.ai
- Email: Available via contact form at https://invaritech.ai/contact
- Location: Hong Kong
